name: Shadow Fey
description: The Shadow Fey is a medium-sized humanoid with traits of mischief and malice endemic to fey. It is known for its ability to operate within darkness and shadows.
memorable: Its distinct ability to vanish into shadows and reappear makes it a challenging foe to pin down.
goals: The Shadow Fey often seeks to cause chaos and mischief, typically in dark environments.
relations: Shadow Fey might be related to other fey creatures or serve darker entities residing in shadowy realms.
environment: Typically found in darkened areas or shadowy locations, avoiding bright sunlight.
strengths: Proficient in stealth and possesses the ability to traverse shadows effectively.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, suffering disadvantages on attack rolls in bright conditions.
attacks: Can attack using a Shortsword for melee and a Shortbow for ranged attacks, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow Traveler allows it to vanish into shadows and reappear within 30 feet, enhancing its elusiveness.
equipment: Wields a shortsword and a shortbow.
senses: Possesses darkvision for enhanced sight in dim light and darkness.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and Perception, giving it a good understanding of magic and attentive awareness.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Can easily maneuver in the dark.
Uses inky tendrils to mark its movements.
test_queries: stealthy creature that vanishes in darkness
humanoid with fey ancestry and stealth abilities
